snippet.title: League of Evil 2 - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
League of Evil is back with a new art style, but the same kick-ass 2D platforming! The controls are tighter, the gameplay is cleaner, not to mention gorgeous retina artwork. Check out Ravenous Games' latest and let us know what you think. League of Evil 2 arrives on the iPhone Feb 28th.

Platform over to IGN for more:
http://wireless.ign.com/objects/123/123674.html

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
